messages.message: I notice that when I use `scan_below` with `left_pos` and `right_pos`, it gets the right position horizontally, but vertically it starts at the top line in the document instead of starting in the line with the keyword I used in `left_pos` and `right_pos`.
Can you try and use `starts_after`?  The `right_pos` and `left_pos` are only used to restrict the x-axis.
starts after in conjunction with right_pos and left_pos?

yup, `starts_after` basically chops off the entire area before the word, so if you can find a unique word in the line that you want to start after, you can restrict the scan to be  in the remaining portion.
hm... got to know. i'll try that next time (jerry rigged my way there with a UDF this time)
